report.title: Species & Occurrence Counts 2
report.description: Gives a total number of species and occurrences recorded according to the filter, filtered to multiple surveys or locations for the survey summary module.
report.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT o.taxon_meaning_id) as species_count, count(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences_count FROM cache_occurrences_functional o WHERE o.zero_abundance='f' AND #website_filter# AND ('#survey_ids#'='0' OR o.survey_id in (#survey_ids#)) AND ('#location_ids#'='0' OR o.location_id in (#location_ids#)) AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) GROUP BY website_id

param.name: survey_ids
param.description: Select the surveys, or leave for all surveys

param.name: location_ids
param.description: Select the locations, or leave for all locations
